name: Transfiguration Solutions
desc:
Allows to significantly increase the resilience and productivity of agricultures and livestock, modifying them via engineered viruses, fungi or other engineered biological agents. In-built apopthosis mechanisms make sure the modified organisms require regular renewal of administered solutions.

However, large-scale transfiguration also increases the danger the organisms pose to the populace, as well as their need for various additional organic nutrients.
